en.bdb: The same sword had killed Madhu-Kaitabh and Shumbh-Nishumbh. O Lord! the same sword may ever be on my left side i.e. I may wear it.4.78.

verse.gurmukhi: DUlIkrn DUmRlocn ky mwsn igD rjwey ]
verse.unicode: ਧੂਲੀਕਰਨ ਧੂਮ੍ਰਲੋਚਨ ਕੇ ਮਾਸਨ ਗਿਧ ਰਜਾਏ ॥

en.bdb: Biralaksh, Chakshrasura etc. were torn into bits and with the same sword, the flesh of Dhumar Lochan was caused to be eaten by the vultures to their fill

ss.gurmukhi: DUlIkrn Aqy DUmRlocn (nw vwly dYNqw) dy mws nwl igDw nUM rjw id`qw hY।
ss.unicode: ਧੂਲੀਕਰਨ ਅਤੇ ਧੂਮ੍ਰਲੋਚਨ (ਨਾ ਵਾਲੇ ਦੈਂਤਾ) ਦੇ ਮਾਸ ਨਾਲ ਗਿਧਾ ਨੂੰ ਰਜਾ ਦਿੱਤਾ ਹੈ।

bdb.gurmukhi: DUlIkrn Aqy DUmRlocn (nw vwly dYNqw) dy mws nwl igDw nUM rjw id`qw hY।

en.bdb: Crores of measures, but without the devotion of One Lord, no one achieved redemption.5.79.

ss.gurmukhi: swry (lok) kroVw aupw kr ky Qk gey hn, pr aus dy Bjn qoN ibnw (aus qlvwr qoN) bc nhIN sky hn ]79]

bdb.gurmukhi: swry (lok) kroVw aupw kr ky Qk gey hn, pr aus dy Bjn qoN ibnw (aus qlvwr qoN) bc nhIN sky hn ]79]
